Software Projects.subtext: For the complete list, see github.com/spond and github.com/veg

rows.subtext: A molecular evolution and statistical inference package with >10000 registered users and ~2500 citations

A comprehensive and efficient suite of methods aimed at finding adaptive and purifying selection acting on coding sequences as well as uncovering evidence of recombination in the evolutionary past of the sample (~500000 processed analyses and ~1000 citations)

A web applications and software library for high throughput molecular epidemiology surveillance of HIV and other pathogens. Currently in use by the CDC and many other public health and research entities.
